instrument_status.comment: Instrument to go back to Illumina.
NaOH wash performed. All volumes correct
Please could you check the chiller as a Timed Out error given. Screenshot on desktop. Now on C108/216.
Laser engine changed and tested-all OK.
Please could you check instrument as on present run intensities for A/C drop by half on C70. Now on C86/216.
Giving Oasis chiller errors again. Please could you check all is okay. Now on C101/108.
NaOH wash done prime OK gkh 17/7/10
Chiller topped up and operation checked. All ok.
Timed out chiller error given. Please could you check it is okay before we reload. Now on C155/224.
NaOH wash completed. Prime volumes ok.
Replaced syringe 1. Primed and checked fluidics.
Please could you check syringe 1 as it looks like it is leaking. Changed last on 15/11. Instrument now idle.
Beadflowcell loaded and footprint adjusted. Ready to run.
Footprint out on lanes 1-5 column's one and two
Mode scrambler replaced. Syringe No 1 replaced with new. Ready to run.
Two things. Please check mode scrambler as All tiles showing effect. Also can we have a new syringe 1 please.
All 8 Syringes replaced with new, fluidics check carried out.
Slight leak noticed on Syringe No: 1, possible leaks starting on Syringe's 5+8
Flowcell chiller unit replaced with new.
GA2x upgrade complete. NaOH wash required prior to next run.
Bead flowcell loaded and footprint checked. Run instrument for 12 cycle imaging run, in which I was unable to replicate fault. Will monitor instrument carefully next run.
please could you check the footprint. Lsne 8 seems to show a problem with it.
Chiller upgrade complete. Ready for wash and run (RH)
Upgrade reagent chiller for long runs (RH)
Validation run looks very good. Request approval for signoff.
Custom objective fitted. Tile tilty adjusted.
manual entry of last wash data from pnc 2008-02-28
